_sText:
[THIS IF MY FIRST ZOMBIE ESCAPE MAP]

You start in a big hole. You found a secret door. Time to escape the zombies!
This map is pretty short. Sorry, But it's an ok map for people who wants to get better skills on Zombie Escape. I am new at adding shadows and reflections, so i didin't added them. I am looking forward for good and bad reviews, I mean this is my first zombie escape map, I wanna know how to improve it.

Next version : White screen before the Nuke
